price: Namoota isaan irra caalan bakka buusuu irratti (danda'oo dha). Nuti dadhabsiifamoo hin taane.
arabic: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: ʿalā an nubaddila khayran min'hum wamā naḥnu bimasbūqīna
